Quick Math Rules Level Difficulty Setup Game
You will see three shapes: two at the bottom and one at the top. Two of them will contain numbers. \n\nThe goal is to make the sum of the numbers in the two bottom shapes equal to the number in the top shape by inserting the missing number.\n \nExample: If the top circle contains the number 7, one of the bottom shapes has a question mark, and the other has the number 4, then the missing number should be 3 because 3 + 4 = 7. Right answers: %s (min: %s) Required number of correct answers: %d Your score: %d Required percentage of answers: %.2f Percentage of answers: %.2f
Max sum value: Min count of right answers: Min percent of right answers: Game time (in seconds):
